title: Experimental design - how to include control group

content.question: How would including a control group be useful in this experiment?

choices.label: It would provide a reference for the effects of random environmental factors.
It would provide a number against which percentages can be computed.
It would provide a value for which the standard pH can be measured.
It would provide a standard number to test for statistical uncertainty.
It would provide an end data point for graphical analysis.

content.answer: It would provide a reference for the effects of random environmental factors.

skill.text: Skill 4.E: Explain modifications to an experimental procedure that will alter results.
